analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x865bfd8232778f00cae81315bf75ef1fe6e30cdd.sol:
	Contract AbleToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x865bfd8232778f00cae81315bf75ef1fe6e30cdd.sol#528-529)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
